data.text: @ISASaxonists He still has way more then plenty of money to live off of thou :/
@ISASaxonists I like how subtly you burned both the racist jackass AND Chingy. Brilliant. https://t.co/34tldCRZH5
@ISASaxonists So he didnt read it. Now that's a compelling argument for a literature degree: reading is important, fellows!

@ISASaxonists Also - how is "I didn't read it a defence"? I mean let's pretend that it's true and he accidentally racisted. So, for $10M I would think reading would be a given but I'll never be a white guy making that kind of money so what do I know?
@ISASaxonists Weird, old rich, white guy posts racist thing and "whoops, don't blame me folx".
